    • Developer Journal

    I document most of the things I'm learning as I'm learning them. This includes step by step installation commands, any advice/feedback, article snippets and sources, questions I have etc. Your mind is for having ideas, not for holding them - David Allen.

    This site was purposely published in a raw HTML state to begin with, so that the focus could be on sharing content without having to wait for the design to be 'finished'.

    Also, I'm learning Russian
